# FooTable - Football Game Results Tracker

This is a Next.js application for tracking weekend football game results with friends.

## Project Structure
- Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
- Features include game management, results tracking, and player statistics
- Uses modern React patterns and responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components and utilities
- Follow Tailwind CSS for styling with a modern, clean design
- Implement responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Use React hooks and functional components
- Focus on user-friendly interfaces for managing football games and results
